__title_description__: The title of your site, shown in the header
title: Speakeasy Bar SDK Docs
__primary_color_description__: Any valid CSS color for setting the primary color of your site. E.g. #75f96f or green. You must restart the server for this to take effect.
__logos_description__: The logo to display. You can use a relative path or a URL. If you use a relative path, make sure the file is in the public folder.
__logo_link_description__: The link to go to when clicking the logo
__favicon_description__: The favicon to display. You can use a relative path or a URL. If you use a relative path, make sure the file is in the public folder.
__code_theme_description__: The code theme to use. See https://codehike.org/docs/themes for a list of themes.
__fonts_description__: The fonts to use. You can use any font from Google Fonts. See https://fonts.google.com/ for a list of fonts.
